question: Lord Clement Atlee was prime minister of England at which of the following events?
explanation: Clement Richard Attlee was the leader of the Labour Party from 1935 to 1955. He served as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom from 1945 to 1951. He was the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom during the time of India's independence. On February 20, 1947 Atlee declared the British would quit India before June 1948.
